## LiveSelector.querySelector() method

Select the first element that is a descendant of node that matches selectors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
querySelector<K extends keyof HTMLElementTagNameMap>(selector: K): LiveSelector<HTMLElementTagNameMap[K], SingleMode>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

selector


</td><td>

K


</td><td>

Selector


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[LiveSelector](./kit.liveselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;HTMLElementTagNameMap\[K\], SingleMode&gt;

## Example


```ts
ls.querySelector('div#root')
```
About chain on querySelector

```ts
ls.querySelector('a').querySelector('b')
// equals to
ls.querySelector('a b')
```
